_setComptroller(address).details: Admin function to set a new comptroller
_setComptroller(address).return: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure (see ErrorReporter.sol for details)

params.borrower: The borrower of vai to be liquidated
params.repayAmount: The amount of the underlying borrowed asset to repay
params.vTokenCollateral: The market in which to seize collateral from the borrower

liquidateVAI(address,uint256,address).return: (uint, uint) An error code (0=success, otherwise a failure, see ErrorReporter.sol), and the actual repayment amount.

getVAIAddress().notice: Return the address of the VAI token

liquidateVAI(address,uint256,address).notice: The sender liquidates the vai minters collateral. The collateral seized is transferred to the liquidator.
